Release Notes for Apttus.Security.Common.1.0.0
---------------------------------------------
First Version of Code in Repository

Release Notes for Apttus.Security.Common.1.0.1
---------------------------------------------
Added UserScope related Enums/DTOs

Release Notes for Apttus.Security.Common - 1.0.2
------------------------------------------------
Merged Apttus.Authentication.Common into Apttus.Security.Common. 
Users will have change the namespace from Apttus.Authentication.Common.* to Apttus.Security.Common.Authentication.*

Release Notes for Apttus.Security.Common 2.0.3
---------------------------------------------
Added Cache Id to TenantConfig
